column5: i have to go to Ajax ( work related) tomorrow and will be bringing some fishing gear...i plan on staying the night and fishing saturday morning for a few hours..problen is ....i dont know the area at all...any ideas on where to fish ? If your uncomfortable posting a location in the open forum ...please feel free to PM me ....  I'll return the favour when/should you decide to come to my neck of the woods...( i never have a problem putting people in front of fish)    Cheers
all i can think of off the top of my head would be frenchmans bay in pickering or hayden shores in whitby
yes to fishmeisters suggestion and duffins creek if you want to try for rainbows and suckers.

thanks fish meister...ill do a googe earth thing and see what i can find ....on these spots...im not taking the boat down there ,,,,just going to bring the long rods and pin for a few hours...probably with little sucess as the water levels must be high with all this rain ...or should i bring spinning gear for chucking hardware ?
wow some one agrees with me! YES ! haha I have caught pike and carp from both places I mentioned other then then that there are other species mixed in.. the odd bowfin , bass, jumbo perch, etc

Your best bet is PM skeeter as he will join ya on all the places we and others go, LOL!  Bring your river/trib stuff and your spoon chucking gear right now.  If I can get out of the office, skeeter (Dann) knows how to get a hold of me to hook up with you guys...  Good luck.  Geoff
Thanks GBW...   Look out skeeter ...your going to have a PM
hahahaha, Dann's good to go out with.  young_one (Will) too.  others I don't know that well...  *edit* BTW, if he (Dann) get's you on fish those are my spots...
and if he doesnt??? are you still responsible????lol....  its all good ....i have to go there anyways just thought i would tighten a line while i was there..
then he took you to his spots... have fun and good luck.
I would try frenchmansbay. There probably won't be any trout in duffins  and there's lots of cat fish carp and pike in frenchmans. Either way good luck.
MY SPOTS! How's the rainbow count GBW?
who's counting? (no time this weekend either as I'm painting the house)
